head.add: the Siluer lent at command' of the tone for the defense of the tovnis matir

div.p:
The xxvj day of marche the yer of god jM iiijC nyntj and viij yeris
thir personis vndir writin at commavnd' of the tone present for the tyme
has lent certane money as eftir follouis to the defence of ane
Summonce maid' apone the commissaris of the common' assedacion
becaus' it is ane common' action' quhilkis salbe pait to thame
agan at the next ass taxt In the first sere Jonhne ruthirfurd
aldirman has lent vj s' and viij d' Alexander menyes vj s' viij d'
Robert blinsell vj s' and viij d' Thomas prat xiij s' iiij d'
Dauid menyes vj s' viij d' alexander chamer vj s' viij d' Johne
Cullane vj s' viij d' Jonhne Colisone v s' Alexander Rede v s'
Jonhne Knollis v s' Jonhne Wormet ij s' Jonhne blak ij s'
William blinsele xvj d' William Kintor xvj d' Robert
crag ij s' Androw murray eldar ij s' alexander gray ij s' Androw
Cullan yongar ij s' nocht withstanding Jonhne of Cullane pait
nocht the said' demi mark

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem pennultimo die
marcij anno Domini et cetera Nonagesimo octauo

The saide day thomas Waus grantit him to pay tile the
factoris of meryobre franchmane ane or may bringar of his
writ subscriuit with his hand' ane barrell of Salmond' sufficient merchand'
gude or ellis ane dakir of hidis in the next Schip cumand' out
of Deipe

The saide day It was ordanit and deliuerit be ane Suorne
assis' William blinsel forspekar that gif euir thar happinnis
ony strubulance betuix Ebe gray and Jonet toschow quhilk
of thame that beis conuikit tharin sal stand xxiiij houris
within the tolbutht and pay x s' to Sanct nicholes werk

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta pretorio eiusdem secundo die
mensis aprilis anno quo supra

The saide day Sandy talyour' seruand' to alexander talyour' was
conuikit be ane assis' Jonhne Cullane forspekar for the
strubulance of Jok Coupar and Jok of scrogis and to amend' as
law will et cetera for the quhilkis it was ordanit that the
said' Sandy suld' be put in the goif and the key in his hand'
that he hurt the said' childer with quhil ane hour eftir novne
at the will of the said' Alexander Coupar' and gif euere he committis
ony strubulance til ony persone in tyme to Cum he salbe
expellit out of this towne

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie per
personas sequentes videlicet Dauid menyes Alexandrum chamer Johannem
Colisone Johannem Cullane thomam prat Andream Cullane Judicatorem
Willelmum blinsell Willelmum futhes Johannem Wormet Dauid matheson
Willelmum portar Robertum crag Dauid Spens malcomum crag thomam
litilJonhne et Andream muresone quod margareta gilespy filia olim
Johannis gilespy est legittima et propinquior heres dicti quondam Johannis
patris suj

The saide day Jonhne Sanclar follouit Dauid menyes and
patrik rede for the frethin of him and his lande of x s'
of annuell in the yer quhilkis denyit and in continent the saide action'
with consent of bath the said partiis was put to the decision' of ane
assis' of thir personis Jonhne of Cullan thomas prat Jonhne Wormet
androw Cullan yongar William blinsell William futhes Dauid matheson
Robert' crag William portar Dauid Spens Malcum crag thomas
litilJonhne and Androw muresone quhilkis the gret aithe Suorne
the richtis and allegacionis of bath the said partiis herd and vndir
standing deliuerit be the moutht of Jonhne of Cullan forspekar
of the saide assis' that the half of the forland pertening to the saide
Dauid menyeis aw to freithe tene s' of the haill annuell
Rent of xl s' aucht of the haill land' eftir the tenor' of
the writis schevin to the saide assis'

Eodem die Dauid menyeis deuenit plegius legalis quod margareta
gilespy et terre sue erunt Indempnes pro alexandro chamer aliter
quam per viam Juris Et Idem Alexander Obligatur ad conseruandum suum plegium
Indempnem de huiusmodi fideiussione

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem sexto die
mensis aprilis quo Supra

the saide day patrik ros' grantit that he hede gevin his pouer
to patrik leslie to Set the land' pertening to his wyf tua
yeris S bigane

Eodem die petrus futhes deuenit plegius legalis
per manus ostensionem quod Andreas smitht erit Indempnis
pro alexandro rolland' et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris
Et Johannes lundoris deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus alexander
erit Indempnis pro dicto andrea et parte sua aliter quam per
viam Juris Et quilibet dictarum parcium obligatur ad relevandum
suos plegios Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

The x day of aprile the yer forsaid Williame andirsone eldar grantit
him pait of xiij ros' noblis of gold' be the handis of mastir
Thomas Raneir' In the name of Jonhne andirsone his brothir
quhilkis the saide Jonhne was aving to him Obefor be ane
contenit in this buk befor thir witnes Dauid mathesone William
buchan and Jonhne Wilyongsone et cetera
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem ix die aprilis quo supra

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Thomas
prat forspekar that Jonhne arthour' is avand' to Dauid Kintor sex
s' g' the availe of it within terme of law to be pait

The saide day Jonhne fechat at the key grantit him avand to
Dauid Kintor yongar vj s' gretis

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xjo die
aprilis

Eodem die procuratorium Johannes Scheual gallicus fecit constituit
et nominavit et creauit Thomam leslie Robertum Cullane et Johannem mar
coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos procuratores ad petendum et recipiendum vnam
obligacionem ab andrea Cullane Juniore pro pipa Wadij Et in omnibus
aliis actionibus et causis ipsum concernentibus ad agendum defendendum litigandum
promitten' de Rato et grato Cum omnibus aliis terminis et clausulis necessariis
et oportunis

Curia Capitalis balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta
In pretorio eiusdem xxiij die mensis aprilis Anno Domini Mmo cccco nonagesimo octavo
quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent et cetera

Eodem die accedens ad barram honorabilis vir Johannes ruthirfurd miles
ac prepositus et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu
quatuor decim solidorum monete scocie sibi annuatim debit' de quadam vasta terra
Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico superiori ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem
vici inter terram quondam henrici tulidef ex orientali ex vna et torrentem
a lacu ad molendinum'm' overwrites 'rum'. aqueductum distenden' ex occidentali partibus
ab altera et terram dicti militis versus austrum et communionem viam regiam
versus boriam ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die
huius processus Testibus Willelmo Kintor Johanne rede et thoma Symsone
seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir magister alexander procurator
et capellanus altaris beate marie virginis infra ecclesiam parrochialem beati nicholaij
dicti burgi situati et Ibidem protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Red
ditu duorum solidorum sibi annuatim debit' et dicto altarj de quadam terra
vasta Jacente in vico viridi inter duos torrentem ex orientali ex vna
et terram quondam Alexandri Kintor ex boreali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit
in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus patricio grig Willelmo
Stile et Andrea nachtj seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram magister alexander fyf capellanus ac procurator
altaris Sancte marie virginis infra ecclesiam parrochialem beati nicholaij situati
et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu duorum solidorum
sibi et dicto altarj debit' et non soluto de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico
viridi qua Itur a dicta ecclesia ad ecclesiam fratrum carmelitarum ex
occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram alexandri mernoche ex australi ex vna et terram
ex boreali partibus ab altera ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam
primo die huius processus testibus patricio grig Willelmo stile et andrea nachtj seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Isabella procuratorio nomine Johannis honysone filij suj
et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu sibi Johanni annuatim
debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in le hukssar hukystarraw ex boreali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Dauid hile ex orientali ex vna et terram
quondam Willelmi balheluy ex occidentali partibus ab altera ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringible preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit
in curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo blyth Johanne pipar
et Jacobo leis seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Andreas chamer Collector Capellanorum Collegij
de abirdene et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu trisdecim s' et iiijor d'
sibi capellanis annuatim debit' de quodam Crofto quondam Ricardi Kintor Jacente in territorio croftorum
de rubislaw ex boreali parte vie regie qua Itur ad molendinum Justiciarij
inter croftum andree murray ex orientali et ex occidentali ad
quod accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentavit in curia tanquam die huius processus testibus andrea robertsone andrea scot
et thoma Symsone seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Dauid liell procurator discreti viri
magistri themannj crab et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo
Redditu quadraginta denariorum sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra
vasta quondam Roberti club Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico superiori ecclesie
ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Duncanj clat
ex orientali ex vna et terram quondam henrici tulideff ex occidentali
partibus ab altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in curia
tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo Kintor Johanne meldrum
et thoma Symsone seriando

head.add: Judicium processus pro magistro Andrea Cadiow

div.p:
Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per magistrum Andream cadiow
et suos procuratores deductis de et super recuperacione proprietatis et
possessionis cuiusdam terre penitus vaste Jacentis infra dictum burgum
in le hukstarraw ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam
patricij coupar ex occidentali ex vna et terram quondam Dauid hill ex orientali
partibus ab altera et communionem viam regiam versus austrum et terram
versus boriam in defectu solucionis vnius annuj Redditus vj s' et octo d'
sibi a longo tempore debit' et non solut' vnde Johannes Colisone
et Willelmus Wormet procuratores et eo nomine dicti magistri andree pecierunt
a ballivis secundum formam suj processus precedentis Juris et Justicie complementum
Et dictus Johannes porrexit procuratorio nomine quo supra plegium in manibus
andree nachtj seriandi quod ipse proprietatem et possessionem dicte terre cum suis
pertinenciis legittime recuperauit in defectu solucionis dicti annuj Redditus
Et hoc ex ore Judicatoris Curie pro Judicio datum fuit
Teste Curia videlicet Johanne ruthirfurd milite ac preposito alexandro menyeis
Roberto blinsele Andrea Cullan Juniore matheo branche dominis Johanne strachin
alexandro club et Roberto Waus capellanis et me Johanne stirueling notario publico

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Willelmus Crukschank
capellanus ac procurator altaris beati Duthaici infra ecclesiam parrochialem
beati nicholaij de abirdene et protestatus fuit in forma
Juris pro vno annuo Redditu sibi et
dicto altari annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente
infra dictum burgum in vico superiori Ecclesie ex australi parte
eiusdem vici inter terram siue portam communionem ex orientali et
torrentem ex occidentali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus testibus
Willelmo Walcar georgio tailyour' et Jacobus seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Willelmus Cruk
schank capellanus ac procurator altaris beati Duthaici infra ecclesiam
parrochialem beati nicholaij de abirdene situati et protestatus fuit in
forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu octo solidorum sibi et dicto altarj
a longo tempore debit' et non solut' de quadam terra vasta Jacente
in vico nauium ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram
Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus testibus Willelmo
Walcar georgio tailyour' et Jacobo leis seriando

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Septimo
die maij anno quo Supra

The saide day comperit Dauid Kyntor and offerit him redy to ansuer
at the Instance of Alexander chamer in ony thingis that he hed to say
till him

The saide day comperit alexander chamer of the quyltis with
Kintor his sistir Sone and exponit how it was
Cumin to his knavlege that Dauid Kintor throw senister
suggestion' and persuasione movit hede gevin ane pretendit
state of his land liand' in the Castalgat one the northt
part of the samyn to Dauid Kintor his sone in preiudice and dishere
sing of the said his ayr quhilk pretendit state he callit
Intrusion' gevin in contrar Justice and law for resonnis and caus'
to be schevin tyme and place quhar it efferis and desirit ane
balye and ane notar to pas' with him to the said lande that he mycht
mak his protestacioun' and brek the said state and the aldirman and
balyeis considerand' the matir gret for waknes of the court continevit
this peticion quhile ffriday that next cumis Ande than the saide
Alexander Solempnitlie protestit quhat thingis that the saide Dauid
hed' done anent the said pretendit state suld' turne his said sistir
Sone to nay preiudice nor skathis in tyme to Cum but that he
mycht haue remed' of law

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiiij
die mensis maij quo Supra

The saide day medy heruy the widew of vmquhil
Jonhne Waus grantit hir aving to William lammynton'
tua barellis of Salmond' ful rede and Suet sufficient
merchand' gude of the richtuys' bynd of this burghe
quhilkis scho oblist hir be the fath of hir bodie to pay
to the said William betuix this and the fest of Sanct peter
Callit lammas next eftir follouing the date of this court

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Johne
Colisone forspekar that Androw scrogis is avand' to Jonhne
annand' v f' meill to be pait within terme of law

xxiij die maij quo Supra In presencia Andree Cullane
et thome leslie duorum ballivorum Joneta ramsay fecit
constituit creauit et nominavit gilbertum menyeis et thomam menyeis
coniunctim et divisim suos legittimos procuratores ad prosequendum Johannem sanclar
pro xvj s' Agend' defendend' et promitten' de Rato et grato

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xxviiij die maij quo Supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit the first day of
June next to Cum to Jonhne Sanclar to ansuer peremp
turlie to thome menyeis procurator to Jonet ramsay for the
wranguislie haldin fra hir of xvj s' for ane hors'
of hirris
